document_data.name: Telimas Dreamweaver
document_data.mainbody: '''Telimas Dreamweaver''' was the elderly founder, and patriarch, of the [[forest gnome|gnomish]] town of [[Stormpemhauder]] in the [[1369 DR|Year of the Gauntlet, 1369 DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Telimas dressed in multicolored robes and carried with him an ornate pipe, a ''+1 [[staff]]'', and a ''+2 [[ring of protection]]''.
document_data.History: Many years before the Year of the Gauntlet, Telimas had a vision of an army of [[spider]]s marching across [[Faer√ªn]], being led by a dark-skinned female [[elf]] who wore a glittering [[silver]] crown. He took this intuitive dream and led the gnomes living throughout the trees to form a trading post within the forest. They began to trade with the [[Dalelands|Dalesmen]] and specialized in the sale of spider-related goods.
